programme.title: Creepshow
programme.desc: A struggling bookstore owner finds unpublished works of George Romero, but the comics lead to new troubles; Shelby's mom struggles to accept that her baby is growing up, but hanging on to childhood relics isn't as harmless as she thinks.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: Gray Matter; The House of the Head
programme.desc: A man's drinking habit becomes insatiable and his appetite grows to frightening proportions; a severed toy head appears in a girl's dollhouse and starts murdering.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.desc: A platoon of American soldiers finds something more sinister than war behind enemy lines; a man with a passion for found objects finds a growing finger.

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.sub-title: All Hallows Eve; The Man in the Suitcase
programme.desc: Teens who go trick-or-treating are met with fear instead of smiles and sweets; Justin brings home the wrong suitcase and is shocked to find a living man stuffed inside.

programme.title: Blood Quantum
programme.desc: The dead are coming back to life and almost all of Earth's population are decimated due to a zombie virus, except for the isolated Mi'kmaq reserve of Red Crow, whose indigenous inhabitants are strangely immune to the zombie plague.

programme.title: One Cut of the Dead
programme.desc: Real zombies attack a hack director and a film crew who are shooting a low budget zombie film in an abandoned WWII Japanese facility.

programme.title: Castle Freak
programme.desc: Terror strikes when a blind woman and her friends travel to a mysterious Albanian castle that harbors dark secrets.

programme.title: Virus-32
programme.desc: A virus spreads throughout the city, causing the infected to become vicious hunters. Iris and her daughter become caught in the massacre, discovering 32-second periods of calm before each attack.

programme.title: Yummy
programme.desc: A young couple travel to a shabby Eastern European hospital for plastic surgery. Once there, things unravel into blood and violence.

programme.title: The Seed
programme.desc: What starts out as a weekend away in a remote luxury villa turns into a tale of horror, death and alien invasion.

programme.title: Mad God
programme.desc: A figure known as The Assassin descends from the heavens into a nightmarish pit full of monsters, titans and cruelty.

programme.title: Blood Glacier
programme.desc: Scientists discover that a red liquid leaking from a nearby glacier contains organisms that turn living hosts into deadly mutants.

programme.title: The Sadness
programme.desc: As Taiwan succumbs to a viral pandemic that transforms peaceful citizens into sadistic, bloodthirsty maniacs, a young couple must battle to be reunited before they too become infected.

programme.title: The Hallow
programme.desc: A family is forced to fight demonic creatures for survival after they move into a remote millhouse in Ireland.

programme.title: Boar
programme.desc: In the beautiful, yet harsh Australian outback lives an animal of staggering size with a ferocious, driving need for blood and destruction. It defends its territory with savage force and kills with a raw, animalistic brutality not seen before.

programme.title: Last Ones Out
programme.desc: A skeptical American is stranded in the middle of a zombie-infected Africa and must rely on the help of three mysterious strangers to make it out alive.
